titles.title: For the relief of Jose de Jesus Ibarra, Monica Ibarra Rodriguez, and Cristina Gamez.

bill.summary:
1/8/2009--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Jose de Jesus Ibarra, Monica Ibarra Rodriguez, and Cristina Gamez.
